name: Defiance 2050: Demolitionist Founder's Pack
description:
Get ready to demolish the New Frontier!

In addition to early access to Defiance 2050, you'll also unlock the Demolitionist class before its official release & get a exclusive tint only available in this pack.

Items will be delivered once head start begins. They will not be available during beta periods.

INCLUDES
3-day Head Start
Demolitionist Class
Demolitionist Outfit + Exclusive Tint
“Demolitionist” Title
